name: Stay Charged
description:
A 2D local multiplayer game where both players must fight for energy for their survival.

Credits:

- Music:  Music by Eric Matyas www.soundimage.org “ROCKIN’ WITH CAPED CRUSADER CAT”

- Sprites:  Characters sprites by GrafxKid from https://grafxkid.itch.io/

Developers:

- Kenneth Rodriguez Murillo

- Joel Vega Godinez

- Joshua Molina Van Den Bergh

- Walter Morales Vasquez
